com.redfin.sitemapgenerator
Class SitemapIndexGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.redfin.sitemapgenerator.SitemapIndexGenerator

public class SitemapIndexGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

Builds a sitemap index, which points only to other sitemaps.

Author:
Dan Fabulich

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

SitemapIndexGenerator

public SitemapIndexGenerator(java.net.URL baseUrl,
                             java.io.File outFile)
Configures the generator with a base URL and destination to write the sitemap index file.

Parameters:
baseUrl - All URLs in the generated sitemap(s) should appear under this base URL
outFile - The sitemap index will be written out at this location

SitemapIndexGenerator

public SitemapIndexGenerator(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                             java.io.File outFile)
                      throws java.net.MalformedURLException
Configures the generator with a base URL and destination to write the sitemap index file.

Parameters:
baseUrl - All URLs in the generated sitemap(s) should appear under this base URL
outFile - The sitemap index will be written out at this location
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException

addUrls

public SitemapIndexGenerator addUrls(java.lang.String prefix,
                                     java.lang.String suffix,
                                     int count)
Add a numbered list of sitemaps to the index, e.g. "sitemap1.xml" "sitemap2.xml" "sitemap3.xml" etc.

Parameters:
prefix - the first part of the filename e.g. "sitemap"
suffix - the last part of the filename e.g. ".xml" or ".xml.gz"
count - the number of sitemaps (1-based)

write

public void write()
Writes out the sitemap index
